statements: SELECT * FROM transactions_table;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions_table;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions_table ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, product_id, payment_method FROM transactions_table WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions_table WHERE customer_id = 'e2522351-03a8-4a05-bb41-13873503fd23';
SELECT * FROM transactions_table WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, product_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions_table WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions_table GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions_table WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions_table GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_transactions > 2
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_name;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, c.customer_name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY t.amount ASC;

SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM customers c LEFT JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING total_amount > 2000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT customer_id, amount, date FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 100
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT customers.name, customers.email, products.name, products.price FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN purchases ON transactions.transaction_id = purchases.transaction_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE customers.name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY products.price ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0 GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT customers.name, products.name, purchases.quantity FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN purchases ON transactions.transaction_id = purchases.transaction_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE purchases.quantity >= 5 ORDER BY customers.name, products.name
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 100.00;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_name = 'Electronics' OR category_name = 'Clothing';
SELECT MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_amount ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT t.transaction_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, t.purchase_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id WHERE t.purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY t.purchase_amount DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, c.first_name AS customer_first_name, c.last_name AS customer_last_name, p.product_name, p.category, t.purchase_amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY t.purchase_date ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, c.first_name AS customer_first_name, c.last_name AS customer_last_name, p.product_name, t.purchase_amount, pm.payment_method_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN payment_methods pm ON t.payment_method_id = pm.payment_method_id WHERE t.purchase_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY t.purchase_amount ASC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM customers c LEFT JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
